flawed_nl_solution:
10% + 50% = 40% of the chips in the jar are not green.
So, 100% - 40% = 60% of the chips are green.
There are 60%/10% = 6 sets of 10% to make 60%.
Hence, there are 3 chips x 6 sets = <<3*6=18>>18 green chips.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
